content: I've completed the initial structure and navigation. Ready for UI implementation.
Great work! I'll start working on the design mockups for the filtering interface.
Shopping cart functionality is progressing well. Implementing the new checkout flow now.
Architecture documentation is almost complete. Will share the technical specs by end of week.
Dashboard components are looking great. Added responsive breakpoints for mobile views.
Found several security vulnerabilities. Created detailed report with remediation steps.
